body_html:
BTW, in the future you can use IsCudaEnabled from
tensorflow/core/util/port.cc in your tests to catch building without GPU
options, AddDevices from tensorflow/core/common_runtime/device_factory.h to
catch cases when GPUs are missing for other reasons

catch cases when GPUs are missing for other reasons

body:
BTW, in the future you can use IsCudaEnabled from
tensorflow/core/util/port.cc in your tests to catch building without GPU
options, AddDevices from tensorflow/core/common_runtime/device_factory.h to
catch cases when GPUs are missing for other reasons

On Fri, Jul 1, 2016 at 2:20 PM, dzhyeon notifications@github.com wrote:
